title: Dum Dum Girls "On Christmas"
description:
“On Christmas” is a delectable synth-pop nugget from New York’s Dum Dum Girls, recorded at Winter Station in Brooklyn, NY. Featured on Converse Rubber Tracks’ holiday music EP, Noise To the World 2. 

Produced and mixed by: Kurt Feldman 
Programming, arrangement, and guitar by: Kurt Feldman
Music and Lyrics by: Dee Dee
Mastered by: Mike Bozzi at Bernie Grundman
